warning.description: To know about command usage or examples, use: ,help <command>

Announcement.short: Allows you to show or opt in to announcements on the Chicken Smoothie
Announcement.description: Allows you to opt in a channel to automatically post new announcements on Chicken Smoothie, or to just show the latest announcement.

Identify.short: Tells you the archive page where a pet or item is located
Identify.description: Identifies the archive page where the pet or item you provided is located at. This command won't work for pets with items.

Image.description: Displays an image of how you would see the pet in your 'My Pets' groups.

Oekaki.description: Displays Oekaki drawing, along with artist name and profile picture. Do not confuse this with dressup scenes! This command will not work with dressup scene links!

Pet.description: Displays information about the pet. Unlike the image command, this command shows all available information about the pet, such as ID, age, and who it's given by.

Time.short: Tells you how long before the pound opens
Time.description: Tells you how long is left before the pound opens.

Trade.description: Displays the C$, Pets, and/or items being offered on each side. Make sure to use the sharing link or it won't work!

Auto Remind.short: Auto ping X minutes before the pound opens
Auto Remind.description: Allows you to set an Auto Remind to ping you at a time you set before the pound opens. The furthest you can set an Auto Remind for at the moment is 60 minutes.

RemindMe.short: Pings you after specified amount of time
RemindMe.description: Pings you after a specified amount of time that you set. The maximum reminding time allowed is 24 hours.

CS.short: Get C$ exchange values to FR currency
CS.description: Calculates the exchange rate for Flight Rising gems and treasure given the amount of C$

Help.short: Get more information about a command
Help.description: Gives you information on usage and examples of a command. If no command is provided, it will send you the command list with general descriptions of each command.

Gems.short: Get gem exchange values to C$ and treasure
Gems.description: Calculates the exchange rate for Chicken Smoothie C$ and treasure given the amount of gems

Invite.short: PM's you the website to get the bot invite link

Statistics.short: Displays hardware information about the bot and system
Statistics.description: Displays information about the system and the bot. Useful to see the current version of the bot or how many servers/users are using this bot.

Support.short: PM's you a link to the CS Pound Development Server
Support.description: Want to contribute to the bot development? This command will PM you a link to the CS Pound Development Server, where you can watch development take place.

Treasure.short: Get treasure exchange values to C$ and gems
Treasure.description: Calculates the exchange rate for Chicken Smoothie C$ and gems given the amount of treasure

Osu.description: View user's osu! stats, and be able to link your own profile.

Giveaway.description: Allows you to setup and create a giveaway for a specified time. If a pet link is provided a image of the pet is displayed.

examples.1: ,giveaway 3h Just a normal giveaway with one winner
examples.2: ,giveaway 1d 2w A two winner giveaway that gives away something!
